This talk is a retrospective of my experience as frontend tech lead at ELCA. We are going to look at some common patterns we noticed during the development of our projects and we are going to present some recommendations on how to improve the quality of our solutions.

Additional Criterias for External Dependencies

  • Evaluate if the abstraction provided by a libray is still relevant with the modern web and its capabilities.
  • Estimate if the abstraction provided by a library is worthful compared to not knowing how the platform works under the hood .
  • Investigate if and how the abstraction provided by a library is trying to refeding the platform .
  • Assess the cost of code ownership.
